name: purchase-order-system
description: Purchase order system written on Google App Engine

scripts.build-js:prod: echo 'no op, po system does not have any bundled js right now'
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && cp -r src build && export NODE_ENV=production && npm run build-js:prod && npm run build-css:prod
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:prod && gcloud app deploy --project=cdac-purchaseorder build/app.yaml build/dispatch.yaml -q --promote
scripts.deploy:demo: npm run build:prod && gcloud app deploy --project=cdac-demo-purchaseorder build/app.yaml build/dispatch.yaml -q --promote

author: cdachurch
